neighborhoods.Description: Upscale and refined, these neighborhoods are known for their posh boutiques, high-end dining, and proximity to major art museums.
These neighborhoods are the epitome of hipster culture, known for their street art, indie music scene, and craft cocktail bars.
Vibrant and lively, these areas are famous for their entertainment and arts scene, interesting shops, and diverse dining options.
Historically diverse communities known for their rich cultural contributions, vibrant music scenes, and significant roles in civil rights movements.
Affluent residential areas known for their well-preserved architecture, high-quality schools, and cultural institutions.
Known for their picturesque streets, stylish boutiques, trendy dining scene, and famous markets/festivals.
Eclectic and bohemian, these neighborhoods are known for their alternative music scenes, bustling markets, and vibrant nightlife.
Historically working-class neighborhoods that have become increasingly gentrified, known for their immigrant heritage and artistic scene.
These neighborhoods have witnessed rapid gentrification and are known for their vibrant arts scene, diverse populations, and popular farmer's markets.
